Body: I can do something I'd categorize as trilled L: I close the air flow in my mouth by placing my tongue behind my upper teeth; then I blow the air out, creating very small opening on the sides. It sounds like a child mimicking a fart :/ It can be either a trill or fricative, depending on how the air gets out. So, I think it's possible. :-) I've never seen it in any language.
